title: Acquisition of New Riverfield Section of Nickaloya Estate belonging to the Sri Lanka State Plantation Corporation for Village Expansion
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Dayashritha Tissera, Minister of State Resources and Enterprise Development,  to allocate an extent of 13.3938 hectares of land from New Riverfield Section of Nickaloya Estate belonging to the Sri Lanka State Plantation Corporation among 54 families at the rate of 02 roods per family, under village expansion, through the Divisional Secretary, Rattota, was approved by the Cabinet.
